sqlMap.select:
select c.*,checku.USER_NAME check_username,achecku.user_name acheck_username,mdyu.USER_NAME lm_username,checkd.dept_cname check_deptname,acheckd.dept_cname acheck_deptname, cid.ym check_ym from qkj_r_score c left join s_sys_user checku on(c.check_user=checku.uuid) left join s_sys_user achecku on(c.acheck_user=achecku.uuid) left join s_sys_user mdyu on(c.lm_user=mdyu.uuid) left join s_sys_department checkd on(checkd.dept_code=c.check_usercode) left join s_sys_department acheckd on(acheckd.dept_code=c.acheck_usercode) LEFT JOIN qkj_r_check cid on(cid.uuid=c.check_id)
c.uuid=#uuid# c.check_id=#check_id#

select u.uuid u_id,u.DEPT_CODE u_code,u.USER_NAME acheck_username,d.dept_cname acheck_deptname from s_sys_user u LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d on (u.dept_code=d.dept_code) left join s_sys_userdept ud on(u.uuid=ud.user_id) LEFT JOIN s_cfg_position p on (p.uuid=ud.[position]) where not exists (select * from qkj_r_score s left join qkj_r_check k on(s.check_id=k.uuid) where s.acheck_user=u.uuid
k.ym like #check_ym# +'%' ) d.dept_code like #fdept# +'%'
p.POSITION_SENIOR In #p[]#
sqlMap.update: Update qkj_r_score Set check_id=#check_id#, acheck_user=#acheck_user#, acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode#, lm_time=#lm_time#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.delete:
Delete From qkj_r_score
Where uuid In #uuid[]#
sqlMap.select: select c.* from qkj_r_sonscore c left join qkj_r_score s on(c.score_id=s.uuid)
sqlMap.update:
Update qkj_r_sonscore Set check_score=#check_score#
Where uuid=#uuid#
